content.raw:
@caguero  I somehow committed to the ign-transport3 branch directly and I have declined the other PR (that was edited online and difficult to change the target)   
As for the  change in `installation.rst`, without this change, it would not be possible to run `sudo apt-get update`   

Before this change, the command line generated this following to the `gazebo-stable.list` file     
```
deb http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable   
xenial main
```
which should be in a single line.   
I will create a new branch next time and send PR instead of committing! Sorry about this and let me know if you have other preference in change to the installation.rst!
content.html:
@caguero I somehow committed to the ign-transport3 branch directly and I have declined the other PR (that was edited online and difficult to change the target)
As for the change in installation.rst, without this change, it would not be possible to run sudo apt-get update

Before this change, the command line generated this following to the gazebo-stable.list file 

deb http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable   
xenial main

which should be in a single line.
I will create a new branch next time and send PR instead of committing! Sorry about this and let me know if you have other preference in change to the installation.rst!
